name: Lux (Ergonath)
description: There once was a grand and mighty forest known as Lumeria, but it was overtaken by shadow and corruption and fell into despair. For years, the forest lay silent, marred by this blackness that had sought to snuff out both light and life. Until one day, a single spark managed to awaken amongst all this darkness. Alone in this world, it set out to take on the corruption that had engulfed its home and bring light back to the forest once more.
